T02D2681:186b-1: badzra bi d'a ra na n'a ma dh'a ra ni t'i k'a /
T02D2681:186b-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa /

T02D2681:186b-5: rgyal ba kun gyi gsang mdzod 'dzin pa yi //

T02D2681:186b-15: da dgos 'brel gyi don ston te /

T02D2681:186b-20: gang bshad pa'i mdo'i don to //

T02D2681:187a-28: sku gsung thugs mtshan ma'i rnam rtog gis mi shigs pas na /
T02D2681:187a-30: bden pa zhes pa ni gsung gi ngo bo bden
T02D2681:187a-31: ba dang ldan pas na bden pa zhes bya bas
T02D2681:187a-33: sku gsung thugs mi 'gyur bas na bden pa ste rtsa ba'i sngags ma tha ma zhes pa'o //

T02D2681:187a-35: rnam par rgyal ba'i don ston te /

T02D2681:187b-36: 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa //

T02D2681:189b-32: ban dha ban dha zhes pa ni khro bo takki
T02D2681:189b-33: r'a dzas gdug pa can gyi bdud thams cad zung
T02D2681:189b-35: kro dha kro dha zhes pa ni khro bo rnams
T02D2681:189b-36: kyis nyon mongs pa rnams la rol cig ces pa'o
T02D2681:189b-37: / k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a zhes pa
T02D2681:189b-38: ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil bas gdug pa rnams
T02D2681:189b-39: zhi bar mdzod cig ces ba'o //
T02D2681:189b-40: tsu ru tsu ru zhes pa ni khro bo aa
T02D2681:189b-41: mo gha p'a shas phrin las mdzod cig ces pa'o
T02D2681:189b-42: / tsanda li zhes pa ni khro bo rgyal po tshur spyon dam tshig la dgongs shig ces pa'o //
T02D2681:189b-43: k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2681:189b-44: zhes pa ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i thugs
T02D2681:189b-45: tshad med pa'i gsung sgras thams cad byang chub sems
T02D2681:189b-46: su zhi bar mdzod cig ces pa'o //
T02D2681:189b-47: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya zhes pa ni khro
T02D2681:190a-0: bo ma h'a ba las bgegs thams cad @190a *
T02D2681:190a-2: badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a zhes pa ni
T02D2681:190a-3: ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar bas thams cad zhi
T02D2681:190a-5: ha ra ha ra badzra dha r'a ya sv'a h'a
T02D2681:190a-6: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'bar ba'i sgo bzhis bgegs
T02D2681:190a-7: thams cad sregs shig ces pa'o //
T02D2681:190a-8: pra ha ra pra ha ra zhes pa ni khro
T02D2681:190a-9: bo bdud rtsi 'khyil bas mtshan ma'i rtog pa thams
T02D2681:190a-10: cad zhi bar mdzod cig ces pa'o //
T02D2681:190a-11: badzra pra bhanydza n'a ya sv'ah'a zhes pa ni byang
T02D2681:190a-12: chub kyi sems rdo rje 'bar bas nyon mongs pa'i
T02D2681:190a-13: bag chags thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig ces pa'o
T02D2681:190a-14: // de yan chad kyis ni khro bo rnams kyi phrin las kyi don bshad do //
T02D2681:190a-15: da ni khro bo rnams kyi bsrung ba'i don ston te /
T02D2681:190a-16: ma tisthir badzra zhes pa ni blo brtan pa'i rdo
T02D2681:190a-17: rjes byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dang ldan par
T02D2681:190a-19: su ti shtir badzra zhes pa ni shin tu brtan
T02D2681:190a-20: pa'i rdo rjes la legs pa'i yon tan dang ldan
T02D2681:190a-22: pra tisthir badzra zhes pa ni so sor brtan pa'i
T02D2681:190a-23: rdo rjes bdag gi lus brten par mdzod cig ces
T02D2681:190a-24: pa'o // ma h'a badzra zhes pa ni chen po rdo rjes bdud las rgyal bar mdzod ces pa'o //
T02D2681:190a-25: aa pra ti ha ha badzra zhes pa ni rab
T02D2681:190a-26: tu brtan pa'i rdo rjes bdag la ye shes kyi
T02D2681:190a-27: mtshon cha gsol cig ces pa'o //
T02D2681:190a-28: aa mo gha badzra zhes pa ni don yod pa'i rdo rjes gzhan thams cad 'joms pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2681:190a-29: ae hya hi badzra zhes pa ni bden pa'i rdo
T02D2681:190a-30: rje bdag 'khor ba las drongs pa shig ces pa'o
T02D2681:190a-31: // sh'i ghram badzra ya sv'ah'a zhes pa ni dpa'
T02D2681:190a-32: bar 'gro ba'i rdo rjes rings par bdag gi las
T02D2681:190a-34: dha ra dha ra zhes pa ni sgo bzhi'i srung ba bstan te /
T02D2681:190a-35: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin thams cad khyer la gzungs su gyis zhes pa'o //
T02D2681:190a-36: dhi ri dhi ri zhes pa ni dbyings kyi rang
T02D2681:190a-37: bzhin chos nyid dang ldan par gyis shig ces pa'o
T02D2681:190a-38: ; / dhu ru dhu ru zhes pa ni lus
T02D2681:190a-39: thams cad thugs rjes zungs la thogs shig ces pa'o
T02D2681:190a-40: ; // sarba badzra ku lam a'a brta ya sv'ah'a //
T02D2681:190a-41: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo dang bcas pas bdag la byin gyis rlobs shig ces pa'o //
T02D2681:190a-42: aa mu kam m'a ya phat ces pa ni bdag
T02D2681:190b-0: dus ma yin pa'i 'jigs @190b ba las bzlog la
T02D2681:190b-1: bdud thams cad choms shig ces pa'o //
T02D2681:190b-2: de yan chad khro bo bcu'i srung ba'i don bshad do /
T02D2681:190b-3: da ni khro bo'i dbang gi don ston te /
T02D2681:190b-4: na ma:sa manta badzra n'am zhes pa ni kun du
T02D2681:190b-5: bzang po'i ye shes rdo rjes rang bzhin gyis dbang
T02D2681:190b-7: sarba ba lam a'a brta yang zhes pa ni stobs po ches dbang bskur cig ces pa'o //
T02D2681:190b-8: ma h'a ba le zhes pa ni stobs po ches
T02D2681:190b-9: mgyogs pa rlung dang 'dra bar dbang bskur cig ces
T02D2681:190b-10: pa'o // ka ta be ta ta le zhes pa
T02D2681:190b-11: ni ye shes kyi mche bas nyon mongs pa'i bdud
T02D2681:190b-13: aa tsa le zhes pa ni khams gsum rnam rgyal
T02D2681:190b-14: gyi sprul pas dbang bskur la skyobs shig ces pa'o
T02D2681:190b-15: // manda la ma ye shes pa ni dkyil 'khor
T02D2681:190b-16: gyi phyi'i srung ma rnams kyis sprul pa'i ngo bo
T02D2681:190b-17: nyid kyi che ba sna tshogs su snang ba'o //
T02D2681:190b-18: aa ti badzra zhes pa ni rdo rje bzang pos thams cad la skyobs shig pa'o //
T02D2681:190b-19: ma h'a ba le be ga ra na ra na
T02D2681:190b-20: zhes pa ni stobs po ches mgyogs pa rlung dang
T02D2681:190b-21: 'dra bas gnod pa thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig
T02D2681:190b-22: pa'o // aa dzi te dzva la dzva la zhes
T02D2681:190b-23: pa ni yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis bdud dang
T02D2681:190b-24: log 'dren rnams sregs shig ces pa'o //
T02D2681:190b-25: ti ti ti ti ping ga le zhes pa ni
T02D2681:190b-26: so sor 'bar ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las skyobs
T02D2681:190b-27: shig pa'o // de ha da ha zhes pa ni bdag gi nyon mongs pa rnams sregs shig pa'o //
T02D2681:190b-28: te dzo ba ti zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i
T02D2681:190b-29: ye shes kyis gti mug pa rnams sol cig pa'o
T02D2681:190b-30: // ti li ti li zhes pa ni bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad med par gyis shig pa'o ;
T02D2681:190b-31: bhandha bhanda zhes pa ni bgegs dang 'byung po thams cad ching shig pa'o //
T02D2681:190b-32: ma h'a ba zhes pa ni stobs po ches las mdzod cig pa'o //
T02D2681:190b-33: badzra aam ku sha dzva l'a ya sv'a h'a zhes
T02D2681:190b-34: pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo me dang 'dra bas
T02D2681:190b-35: mtshan ma thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig pa'o //
T02D2681:190b-36: de yan chad khro bo bcu'i rang gi las bshad pa'o //
T02D2681:190b-37: da ni ye shes kyi khro bo lag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin ston te /
T02D2681:190b-38: na mo ratna tra y'a la zhes pa ni dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //
T02D2681:190b-39: na ma: tsanda badzra p'a na ye zhes pa khams
T02D2681:190b-40: gsum gyi gnod sbyin rnams gdul ba'i phyir lag na
T02D2681:191a-0: @191a * // rdo rje khro bo'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2681:191a-1: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye zhes pa
T02D2681:191a-2: ni gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na
T02D2681:191a-3: rdo rje ye shes kyi ngo bor bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2681:191a-4: tadya th'a ni 'di lta ste zhes pa'o //
T02D2681:191a-5: aom ha ra ha ra badzra zhes pa ni ye
T02D2681:191a-6: shes kyi lag na rdo rje dbus su bzhugs te
T02D2681:191a-7: / ma tha ma tha badzra zhes pa ni h'um ka ra gshin rje gshed du bstan pa'o //
T02D2681:191a-8: dhu na dhu na badzra zhes pa ni mtshan ma thams cad 'joms pas na /
T02D2681:191a-9: khams gsum rnam par rgyal pa'i snying po'o //
T02D2681:191a-10: da ha da ha badzra zhes pa ni rta mgrin gyi snying po'o //
T02D2681:191a-11: pa tsa pa tsa badzra zhes pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i snying po'o //
T02D2681:191a-12: dha ra dha ra badzra zhes pa ni stobs po che'i snying po'o //
T02D2681:191a-13: d'a ra ya d'a ra ya badzra zhes pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po'o //
T02D2681:191a-14: d'a ru na d'a ru na badzra zhes pa ni mi g-yo mgon po'i snying po'o //
T02D2681:191a-15: tstshinda tstshinda badzra zhes pa ni dbyug pa sngon po'i snying po'o //
T02D2681:191a-16: bhinda bhinda badzra h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2681:191a-17: zhes pa ni padma 'khyil pa'i snying po'o //
T02D2681:191a-18: de yan chad khro bo'i rang bzhin bshad do /
T02D2681:191a-20: // / na ma shtsanta badzra kro dha ya h'um zhes pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'i don to //
T02D2681:191a-21: da ni sgo ba bzhi'i don ston te /
T02D2681:191a-22: hu lu hu lu zhes pa ni shar gyi sgo
T02D2681:191a-23: bas bgegs dang 'byung po thams cad tshur drongs shig
T02D2681:191a-24: pa'o // tishtha tishtha zhes pa ni lho'i sgo bas chings shig chings shig pa'o //
T02D2681:191a-25: bandha bandha zhes pa ni nub kyi sgo bas bgegs dang log 'dren rnams choms shig choms shig pa'o //
T02D2681:191a-26: ha na ha na zhes pa ni byang gi sgo bas rtogs shig rtogs shig pa'o //
T02D2681:191a-27: aa mri te h'um phat ces pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags te /
T02D2681:191a-28: gang gi sngags thams cad kyi lhag chad skong pa'o //
T02D2681:191a-29: der khro bo rnams kyi don bshad nas //
T02D2681:191a-30: da ni yon tan gyi rnam grangs kyi sgo nas bye brag 'chad de /
T02D2681:191a-31: sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas //
T02D2681:191a-32: sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed //
T02D2681:191a-33: ces pa ni rgyud 'di'i don la zhugs te dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gzhung bzhin du bya ste /
T02D2681:191a-34: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs pa byas na nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T02D2681:191a-36: chos kyi sgrib pa'i sdig pa la sogs pa byang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2681:191b-0: sdug bsngal thams cad med par @191b byed ;
T02D2681:191b-1: / ces pa ni rgyud 'di nyams su blangs shing bsgrubs na /
T02D2681:191b-2: nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o //
T02D2681:191b-3: rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste //
T02D2681:191b-4: zhes pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs
T02D2681:191b-5: pa'i rgyud thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir
T02D2681:191b-6: ro// dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan //
T02D2681:191b-7: zhes pa ni dpal ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
T02D2681:191b-8: las 'das pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pas
T02D2681:191b-9: na'o // kun ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang de'i don rtogs pa las 'byung ba'o //
T02D2681:191b-10: de'i don nyams su blangs shing phul du phyin na legs par brgyan zhes pa'o //
T02D2681:191b-11: sems can dbang po nyams pa dang //
T02D2681:191b-12: zhes pa ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la mi nad dang phyugs nad dang tshe dang /
T02D2681:191b-13: mdangs 'phrog pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa'i byed pa
T02D2681:191b-14: rnams 'di'i don nyams su blangs na bzlog par 'gyur
T02D2681:191b-15: ro // tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang //
T02D2681:191b-16: zhes pa ni tshe zad pa gso ba'i thabs ston
T02D2681:191b-17: te dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la phrin las bzhi
T02D2681:191b-18: gzhung bzhin byas te mchod na tshe nyams pa sos
T02D2681:191b-19: par 'gyur ro // phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang //
T02D2681:191b-20: zhes pa ni mdog nyams pa gso pa'i thabs ston te /
T02D2681:191b-21: khams gsum gyi sems can bkres pa dang grang ba
T02D2681:191b-22: la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis byang chub la mi
T02D2681:191b-23: chags te / sdug bsngal la chags pas de sbyang
T02D2681:191b-24: ba'i thabs ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs
T02D2681:191b-25: la rgyas pa'i las byas na bde ba phun sum
T02D2681:191b-27: lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang //
T02D2681:191b-29: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha mi dga' ba ston te /
T02D2681:191b-30: bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dbang dang dam tshig
T02D2681:191b-31: nos nas 'jig rten pa'i las dang mthun pa'i spyod
T02D2681:191b-32: pa byas pas lha rnams mi dgyes te /
T02D2681:191b-33: de zhi bar bya ba'i thabs ni rang yi dam lhar zhugs nas dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2681:191b-34: mchod rdzas la sogs pa thams cad mang por bsgyur te /
T02D2681:191b-35: dbang gi las byas na 'grub po //
T02D2681:191b-36: mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang //
T02D2681:191b-37: zhes pa ni lha 'phangs pa'i snga ltas te rang
T02D2681:191b-38: gi mdza' ba dang 'khor la sogs pa zhe sdang
T02D2681:192a-1: sems la sogs pa byed de de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir drag po'i las byas nas 'grub bo //
T02D2681:192a-2: bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang //
T02D2681:192a-3: zhes pa ni rgyal po log pa'i stobs can gyis
T02D2681:192a-4: bram ze la gseg shad brgyab pa'i rnam smin la
T02D2681:192a-5: bya ste / rang gis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2681:192a-6: phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang //
T02D2681:192a-7: zhes pa ni mi mthun pa ston te //
T02D2681:192a-8: gdon 'byung pos byin gyis brlabs pas sems can thams cad dgra byed de /
T02D2681:192a-9: khrus chog byas na gang yang 'grub po //
T02D2681:192a-10: nor 'grib pas ni gnod pa dang //
T02D2681:192a-11: zhes pa ni nor yod pa de nyams te phongs
T02D2681:192a-12: par gyur na rgyas pa'i las byas na nor dang
T02D2681:192a-14: mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang //
T02D2681:192a-15: zhes pa ni mya ngan gyi gnas ston te /
T02D2681:192a-16: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i
T02D2681:192a-17: mya ngan gyis gzir ba la zhi pa'i las byas
T02D2681:192a-19: 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang /
T02D2681:192a-20: zhes pa ni 'jigs shing phongs pa ston te /
T02D2681:192a-21: sems can rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2681:192a-25: skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2681:192a-26: mgon skyob med de phongs pa la sogs pa la phrin las bzhi'i las byas na 'grub pa'o //
T02D2681:192a-27: gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang //
T02D2681:192a-28: zhes pa ni byad stems ston te /
T02D2681:192a-29: 'jig rten gyi gza' chen po brgyad dang /
T02D2681:192a-30: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi byad stems la gza' dang /
T02D2681:192a-31: rgyu skar gyi cho ga byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2681:192a-32: mi bzad gdon gyi nyen pa dang /
T02D2681:192a-33: zhes pa ni gdon stong phrag brgyad cus nyen pa
T02D2681:192a-34: la phrin las bzhi'i las byas na 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2681:192a-35: ro // mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi //
T02D2681:192a-36: rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang //
T02D2681:192a-37: zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sems can phyin ci
T02D2681:192a-38: log gi lta ba ngan pa'i mya ngan gyis gdungs
T02D2681:192a-39: pa'am / lus sems na zhing thang chad pas 'thibs
T02D2681:192a-40: pa gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na sdig pa'i bag
T02D2681:192a-41: chags rmis na phrin las bzhi'i las byas na 'grub
T02D2681:192a-42: pa'am / pa'o // des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin //
T02D2681:192a-43: zhes pa ni cho ga'i thabs ston te /
T02D2681:192b-0: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs par byas @192b la ;
T02D2681:192b-1: slob dpon gyis bdud rtsi'i bum pas slob ma'i spyi
T02D2681:192b-2: bor dbang bskur zhing khrus byas na mi gtsang ba
T02D2681:192b-3: la sogs pa thams cad 'dag go //
T02D2681:192b-4: gtsang ma ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
T02D2681:192b-5: mdo sde dam pa mnyam par bya //
T02D2681:192b-6: zhes pa ni slob ma ni byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
T02D2681:192b-7: mdo sde'i don nyan du bcug la lha dbog bsgom du gzhug pa bya'o //
T02D2681:192b-8: gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing //
T02D2681:192b-9: gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te //
T02D2681:192b-11: slob dpon gyis slob ma de la ras sam dar
T02D2681:192b-12: dkar la sogs pa'i gos gcang ma bskon la dri
T02D2681:192b-13: zhim po'i me tog la sogs pa'i rgyan mang pos
T02D2681:192b-15: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba //
T02D2681:192b-16: mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na //
T02D2681:192b-17: zhes pa ni thag pa chen po'i chos mnyan pa'i yon tan ston te /
T02D2681:192b-19: mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di klog pa dang 'dzin pa
T02D2681:192b-20: dang gzhan la ston cing nyams su longs shig pa
T02D2681:192b-21: bstan to // mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2681:192b-22: srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi //
T02D2681:192b-23: zhes pa ni mdo sde 'di nyan cing nyams su
T02D2681:192b-24: len pa'i gzi byin gyis nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa
T02D2681:192b-25: dang / sdug bsngal gyi bye brag thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o //
T02D2681:192b-26: mi bzad pa yi nang rnams kyang //
T02D2681:192b-27: de dag thams cad zhi par blta //
T02D2681:192b-29: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags mi bzad pa rnams dang /
T02D2681:192b-30: nad kyi rang bzhin rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2681:192b-32: de'i 'og tu bde ba thob pa'i rtags ston te /
T02D2681:192b-34: sdig pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02D2681:192b-36: sems can thams cad kyi tshe zad pa'am 'chi ba la sogs pa bzlog pa ste /
T02D2681:192b-37: mdo sde 'di mnyan pa'am bsam pa'am bsgoms pas tshe
T02D2681:192b-38: dang bsod nams tshad med pa 'phel par 'gyur ro
T02D2681:192b-39: // de yan chad kyis cho ga'i thabs dang phan yon bshad do //
T02D2681:192b-40: da ni bum pa'i cho ga dang cha rkyen ston te /
T02D2681:192b-41: nor bu yungs kar d'ur ba dang //
T02D2681:192b-42: zhes pa ni nor bu ni mu tig dang gzi mchod dang byi ru'o //
T02D2681:192b-43: yungs kar ni 'bru sna lnga'i gtso bo ste /
T02D2681:193a-2: de'i khongs su bya kri seng kri tsandan la sogs pa ste shing yal gcan no //
T02D2681:193a-3: rin chen rma med tsandan bcas //
T02D2681:193a-4: zhes pa ni rin po che lnga dang /
T02D2681:193a-6: rin chen lnga ni gser dang /
T02D2681:193a-8: aindra n'i la dang byi ru'o //
T02D2681:193a-9: rma med pa ni de rnams skyon med pa la bya'o //
T02D2681:193a-10: tsandan ni gla rtsi dang gur gum dang /
T02D2681:193a-14: shel dang rdo rje me tog dang /
T02D2681:193a-15: zhes pa ni snying po ste /
T02D2681:193a-16: me shes dang chu shel dang /
T02D2681:193a-17: rtsi thog gi snying po mar dang /
T02D2681:193a-18: shing thog gi snying po bu ram dang /
T02D2681:193a-19: me tog gi snying po sbrang rtsi ste snying po lnga'o//
T02D2681:193a-20: rdo rje me tog ni bum pa'i gdan te /
T02D2681:193a-21: dbyar me tog gi dkyil 'khor bya /
T02D2681:193a-22: dgun tshon sna lnga'i dkyil 'khor bya /
T02D2681:193a-24: chu yis gser ram yang na ni //
T02D2681:193a-25: dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung //
T02D2681:193a-26: gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkri zhing dgang //
T02D2681:193a-27: zhes pa ni bum pa'i rgyu ston te /
T02D2681:193a-28: rgyal po la gser gyi bum pa /
T02D2681:193a-29: blon po la dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang zhes pa mang po ste /
T02D2681:193a-30: dmangs la zangs sam sa las bya //
T02D2681:193a-31: gtsang ma'i gos ni ras kha tshar ma nyams pa la bya'o //
T02D2681:193a-32: lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam //
T02D2681:193a-33: yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2681:193a-34: rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas ni //
T02D2681:193a-36: rgyal po dang blon po la brgya rtsa brgyad do //
T02D2681:193a-37: blon po tha ma'am dmangs la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so //
T02D2681:193a-38: dmangs tha ma la bdun bzlas so //
T02D2681:193a-39: rgyal po rtag tu khrus kyis shig / ces pa ni rgyal po stobs can snying po la bya'o //
T02D2681:193a-40: rgyal po sngon la smos pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2681:193a-41: bsod nams can gyis sngon la byas na thams cad la bde ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2681:193a-42: 'bangs ni rgyal po'i 'khor yin te don gyis shes par bya'o /
T02D2681:193a-44: // / rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i don rnam par phye ste bshad pa /
